title: Simeon Stylites the Younger
summary: Saint Simeon Stylites the Younger, also known as Simeon of the Admirable Mountain (Greek: Συμεὼν ὁ νεώτερος ὁ στυλίτης, Arabic: مار سمعان العمودي الأصغر mār semʻān l-ʻamūdī l-asghar) (521 – 596/597), is a saint in the Eastern Orthodox Church and Catholic Churches of Eastern and Latin Rites.
